scripts.script_content: Now we've got Cass Daley singing A Good Man Is Hard to Find. I wonder, does this song really capture the rarity of finding a great partner out there in life? Or is it just highlighting how much women are often shouldering more responsibility for relationships themselves these days. (plays 'A Good Man Is Hard To Find' by Cass Daley)

Now Louis Armstrong takes us on an intimate journey, crooning about a kiss that could build dreams. I wonder if he means the kind of dream kiss you share with someone special when sparks are flying and romance is new. Let's find out as Satchmo spins this sweet serenade for us tonight!
